name: Cazzle - Sleeping Cat Puzzles
description:
Cazzle - Sleeping Cat Puzzles

A puzzle game for all cat lovers

Have fun with Cazzle, a puzzle game for all cat lovers! It was developed in collaboration with the ‘Cats sleeping in awkward positions’ facebook page, whose fans provided the pictures for the 20+ cute sleeping cat puzzles. 

Use the escape key to return from the puzzle to the main menu.

Give it a go and you’ll fall in love! Remember to rate this game!
